title: Topic 001 Question 020
body: You have provisioned some virtual machines (VMs) on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using the gcloud command line tool. However, you are standardizing with
Terraform and want to manage these VMs using Terraform instead.
What are the two things you must do to achieve this? (Choose two.)
options: Provision new VMs using Terraform with the same VM names
Use the terraform import command for the existing VMs
Write Terraform configuration for the existing VMs
